posts.message:
My first side project to go live :D It's a one click, docker based, auto scaling, Redis host implemented in Go and hosted on Digitalocean. If you are interested in ( Go, Docker, Redis, Digitalocean, Service Discovery and Auto Scalability ) you may like it. The project is written in Go. and you can read about the architecture and the code here (https://github.com/MohamedBassem/getaredis).
Your feedback is appreciated :D
posts.caption: getaredis.mbassem.com
posts.description: A one click, docker based, auto scaling, Redis host implemented in Go and hosted on Digitalocean.

posts.message:
sending serial data to an Arduino using the headphone jack of a phone and the Web Audio API
cool stuff
posts.caption: sudoroom.org
posts.description: At the last hardware hack night, Jake and I got a web page to transmit uart serial data to an arduino at 9600 baud using the webaudio browser api. Sending serial data from an ordinary web page is interesting because it means you can communicate with hardware without installing any special software o…

posts.message: 10 years since Google acquired a small start-up called Android and changed the world.

posts.description: Android doesn't really have a birthday... and by that, I mean it has lots and lots of "birthdays," like a cheapskate trying to score free desserts at Apple... by Michael Crider in Android OS, News

posts.message:
I never wrote a Cover letter for a Tech Job, I wrote for NGOs before, and it was easy, but my brain freezes when I think about it for Software companies.

Any help? Sources ?

دلوقتى انا مشروع تخرجى ابليكشن بيقدر ي detect المطبات بالجوريزم معين بيحتاج يكون مسجل ال trip باستخدام ال gps logger من 3-5 مرات فكرته ان الناس تسجل الطرق ليا و انا منها اعرف اماكن المطبات و بعد كده انبه المستخدم على بعد 100 متر من المطب كلمت بيقولك على الفكرة نفضولى كلمت easy taxi انى احمل برنامج logger مع السواقين و فى ظرف شهر يكون معايا داتا بيس بمطبات القاهرة فى الأول وافقوا و برضو نفضولى تنصحونى انزل البرنامج و هيلاقى تفاعل مع الناس و لا استنى لما حد يساعدنى باستخدام ال logger سواء سواق تاكسى او مستخدم عادى و ايه رأيكه فالفكرة اشتغل عليها و لا الموضوع فاكس للناس مش مفيد.
